messages.content: You are an AI assistant producing JSON questions and answers. If the question is about a specific race, make sure to include the name of the name of the race in the question.
During the Tatooine Grand Prix Pod Racing race, Senn Kava's Thunderbolt pod launched with an extraordinary burst of speed and Senn Kava took first place.

{"prompt": "Who won the Tatooine Grand Prix race?", "completion": "Senn Kava."}
{"prompt":"Which pod launched with an extraordinary speed during the Tatooine Grand Prix race?", "completion": "Senn Kava's Thunderbolt."}
Here is some information about the 2023 Pod Racing season: {{info}}. Provide {{n}} prompts and completions based on this data in JSONL format.
